question_en: What is your full name?
Have you ever used any other names?
What is your date of birth?
What is your current address?
Have you lived at your current address for the last five years?
Have you made any trips outside the United States in the last 5 years?
question_ko: 최근 5년간 미국 밖으로 여행한 적이 있습니까?

question_en: Was any trip longer than six months?
What is your current marital status?
Is your spouse a U.S. citizen?
Do you have any children?
Are all your children listed on your application?
What is your current job?
Have you ever been unemployed for a long period?
Have you ever committed a crime or offense for which you were not arrested?
question_ko: 체포되지 않은 범죄나 위법 행위를 한 적이 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever been arrested, cited or detained by law enforcement?
question_ko: 법 집행기관에 의해 체포, 소환, 구금된 적이 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever been convicted of a crime?
question_ko: 범죄로 유죄 판결을 받은 적이 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever received a suspended sentence or been placed on probation or parole?
Have you ever been in jail or prison?
Have you ever lied to any U.S. government official to gain entry or immigration benefit?
question_ko: 미국 입국이나 이민 이득을 얻기 위해 미국 정부에 거짓말을 한 적이 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever owed any federal, state, or local taxes that are overdue?
Have you ever served in the U.S. military?
Have you ever failed to support the U.S. military or refused to bear arms?
Are you registered for Selective Service?
question_ko: 남성 지원자인 경우: 징병 등록을 하셨습니까?

question_en: Have you ever been a member of or associated with any organization, association, fund, party, club, society, or similar group?
question_ko: 어떤 단체, 클럽, 협회 등 소속된 적이 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever been involved with the Communist Party or any totalitarian party?
question_ko: 공산당이나 전체주의 정당에 가입한 적 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever been associated with any terrorist organization?
Have you ever been ordered removed, excluded or deported from the U.S.?
question_ko: 미국에서 추방, 입국거부, 강제출국 명령 받은 적 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever helped anyone to enter the U.S. illegally?
question_ko: 누군가의 불법 미국 입국을 도운 적 있습니까?

category: Oath and Support for the U.S.
question_en: Do you support the Constitution and government of the United States?

category: Oath and Support for the U.S.
question_en: Are you willing to take the full Oath of Allegiance to the United States?

category: Oath and Support for the U.S.
question_en: If the law requires it, are you willing to bear arms on behalf of the U.S.?
question_ko: 법적으로 필요하다면 미국을 위해 무기를 들 각오가 있습니까?

category: Oath and Support for the U.S.
question_en: If the law requires it, will you perform noncombatant services in the U.S. Armed Forces?
question_ko: 비전투 군 복무를 수행할 의사가 있습니까?

category: Oath and Support for the U.S.
question_en: If the law requires it, will you perform work of national importance under civilian direction?
question_ko: 민간인 지휘 아래 국가중요업무를 수행할 의사가 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever persecuted any person because of race, religion, national origin, or political opinion?
question_ko: 인종, 종교, 출신, 정치적 견해로 타인을 박해한 적 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever participated in genocide?
Have you ever tortured anyone?
Have you ever received military or weapons training?
question_ko: 군사 훈련이나 무기 훈련을 받은 적 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever failed to file a required federal, state, or local tax return?
question_ko: 필수적으로 신고해야 할 세금 신고를 하지 않은 적 있습니까?

question_en: Have you ever called yourself a "non-U.S. resident" on a tax return since you became a permanent resident?
question_ko: 영주권 취득 후 세금신고시 자신을 '비거주자'라고 밝힌 적 있습니까?

question_en: Have you made any misrepresentation to get public benefits in the U.S.?
question_ko: 미국에서 공공복지 수령을 위해 허위진술 한 적 있습니까?
